Dino-Chomp!

  1. Since you have to discard your hand to activate Dino-Chomp!, can you still play Dino-Chomp! if it is the only card in your hand?
    Yes. Discarding your hand is not a cost, but an effect of the card. If your hand is empty, youâ€™ll discard nothing.
